players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
Diana: "I think we should verify Bob's claim before voting. Why did you investigate Charlie specifically?"
Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafioso. Bob is trying to frame me to save himself."
Charlie: "I am the detective. Bob is lying. I investigated him N1 and he is mafia. Trust me, vote Bob."

You: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows he is mafia. Diana, if you don't believe me, vote me out tomorrow, but today we must eliminate Charlie to prevent another kill tonight."
Diana: "Charlie, why did you investigate Bob specifically last night?"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
